entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 12:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
